imdb.title: Zonbi rôn
imdb.plot: This clever, modern take on the zombie genre follows Michiru Kita, who possesses a gift that allows her to see who's about to die. When she discovers that two of her classmates are both zombies (and zombie hunters), they invite he...

episodes.title: Shinigami no hi
episodes.plot: A girl named Kita can see the ring that appears on a person's neck when they are about to die. After seeing it on two boys in her class, she seeks to warn them, only to discover that the boys are already dead, but are still walking around.

episodes.title: Ittoku?
episodes.plot: Shito and Chika investigate disappearances at their school. They ask Michiru to help them, but she is more concerned about the ring that she saw around her neck. However, when Michiru finds out that her friend has gone missing, she decides to look for her friend at the school.

episodes.title: Shisha no shita
episodes.plot: Now that Michiru works for the Zombie-Loan office, she moves out of her relatives' place. Chika, who is still claiming to be using her for her Shinigami Eyes, introduces her to the various strange people who work at Zombie Loan.

episodes.title: Chô no haoto
episodes.plot: Chika's old acquaintance, Reiichirou Shiba, helps Chika and Michiru out of a jam. Shiba then tags along with the two to the Z-Loan office, where Shito instantly points his gun at him. Chika convinces everyone that he is of no harm. Meanwhile, a new addition to the office is introduced, in order to help them with their upcoming job.

episodes.title: Ikenie
episodes.plot: When the office investigates a mysterious "butterfly" group, Koyomi and Michiru get mistaken as two of its members due to the butterfly symbols on their shirts. However, they get found out after Michiru tells them how bad it is to kill people, so Yomi comes to Michiru's rescue when they attack her.

episodes.title: Jiyû e no katsubô
episodes.plot: As Shito and Chika battle Shiba, we flashback to the past, and learn exactly how Shiba became a zombie. After learning about Shiba, the others can't help but wonder-what happens after zombies die?

episodes.title: Samayou kokoro
episodes.plot: The Zombie-Loan group ends up going to a hot spring. There, Michiru finds out the pricing for zombies: the more dangerous, the more money. Also, Shito and Michiru end up being attacked by a wolf-like creature that turns out to be a werewolf.

episodes.title: Shinde kara mo, kodoku
episodes.plot: Michiru has an encounter with two unexpected guests: Chika's father and sister, Yuri and Momoka. She's more than a little surprised to learn that Chika's family are actually a rather lively bunch. Meanwhile, Shito has a meeting with destiny.

episodes.title: Ikita shi
episodes.plot: Toho, a member of the mafia, tells the Zombie-Loan office that Shito has been abducted, and that he will take on the task of retrieving Shito himself, since Shito is an important asset to him.

episodes.title: Mamoritai
episodes.plot: Battle is unlocked as both A and Z-Loan must make 10 million yen before the other. Though it comes with a heavy price, for the loser will have all of their zombies terminated. A-Loan takes a lead in the competition with superior weapons.
